content.text: Halloween because I love dressing up!
I like Halloween too! Do you have a favorite costume you've worn?
I've been a zombie a few times.
That's cool! I've never done a zombie costume.
You should try it! It's really fun.
What do you like to do for Halloween?
I like to go to parties and watch scary movies.
I like that too! I also like to go trick or treating.
I don't go trick or treating anymore because I have a family, but I remember it being really fun when I was younger.
It is really fun! I like getting all the candy.
Me too! I'm glad you like Halloween. It's my favorite holiday.
Me too! It's such a fun time of year.
